reviews.review: Great game. I want to try and get all the achievements but I completed the story in 4 hours. Worth it and alot of fun.
as soon as I started thinking with portals my brain expanded beyond comprehension

I have no idea how i didn't play this game until now as of 2021.
The ending was so fulfilling
11/10 would recommend this game.

Jetzt habe ich diesen Klassiker endlich mal nachgeholt. Auch 2021 macht das Spiel unglaublich viel Spaß. Durch die kurze Spielzeit habe ich Portal in einem Rutsch wegspielen können. Das ist sehr angenehm zu den ausufernden Games wie AC oder jegliches andere Ubisoft-Games heutzutage. Ich zocke jetzt Portal 2... 
Klare Kaufempfehlung!

Please read this review thoroughly:
The puzzles are way to hard and it's like you need a portal to do everything. Even if the puzzles were easier the game would be a lot less fun and the game overall sucks. I feel as if I need help with every puzzle. You get absolutley NO context on what to do and you need to figure out what to do by yourself. And the robot "helping" you just tells you where to go and brings you down as if you're just a lab rat and a test subject. There are robots EVERYWHERE and I would not recommend the game. The only thing about Portal is the graphics quality.
I played this on xbox 360 orange box. still a good game just got it on pc for mounting onto gmod
one of the best puzzle games to ever be on the earth
The game aged very well, quite a lot of thinking, especially for the challenge map. The length of the game is optimum, end just before you start feeling bored and annoyed.

实验室背景和传送门的设定很nice~用传送门来坑激光枪太有趣了hhh
感觉没有太强的解谜感，更多的是考验操作（落差二段跳跳到怀疑人生orz
激光枪语音可爱hhh就是被打到以后会流血有点可怕。。。
所以为什么不给我吃小蛋糕=n=（喂
通关的音乐好听~
总之是值得玩的游戏~有机会要玩一下2！
No i co z tym ciastkiem?

Wholesome puzzle game with friendly robots.
Portal gun is fun to play.

i can't believe i had to kill the weighted companion cube 


also i don't know why i can't beat level 18
spedrun it to like under a hour
Es relativamente corto, pero tiene muy buenas mecanincas y es muy entretenindo
En plus de stimuler le cerveau, ce jeu est franchement drôle ! Pour les cérébraux, je recommande chaudement !

I think everyone knows this game is good by now. I can go into why but I real quick just want to say to this day I have no idea how they made this system work. Like, holy crap. My only complaint is it's a little short. I've finished the game in 6 hours and being frank I feel like it took me longer than intended. Definitely good but I'd wait for a sale to pick it up. Worth every minute I played tho.

This game is one I come back to so many times. You can beat it in an hour and it still feels fresh every time and you always find something new about it. A timeless classic that is always good fun.

Except the challenges. Have yet to beat those.
[insert obligatory cake is a lie joke]
Best, and will always outrise black mesa, maybe...

Even eleven years later, this game is still amazing. It still looks pretty good too, in my opinion. It runs super well even on my terribly underpowered laptop, and was just a great game to relax to. It gets bonus points for having a native Linux version and not requiring Proton or any other tools like that.

Gierka bardzo fajna. Kozacka fabuła i ogólnie wszystko. Jak jesteście głodni do macie przepis na pyszne naleśniki: 
SKŁADNIKI
 10 SZTUK
1 szklanka mąki pszennej
2 jajka
1 szklanka mleka
3/4 szklanki wody (najlepiej gazowanej)
szczypta soli
3 łyżki masła lub oleju roślinnego
PRZYGOTOWANIE
Mąkę wsypać do miski, dodać jajka, mleko, wodę i sól. Zmiksować na gładkie ciasto. Dodać roztopione masło lub olej roślinny i razem zmiksować (lub wykorzystać tłuszcz do smarowania patelni przed smażeniem każdego naleśnika).
Naleśniki smażyć na dobrze rozgrzanej patelni z cienkim dnem np. naleśnikowej. Przewrócić na drugą stronę gdy spód naleśnika będzie już ładnie zrumieniony i ścięty.
es un buen juego... PERO EL PORTAL 2 ESTA MEJOR XD

Auch wenn sich das ganze Spiel anfühlt wie ein Tutorial und es nach wenigen Stunden durchgespielt ist, macht das Spiel viel Spaß und man kann es auch gut öfter spielen, anstatt nach einem Playthrough für ein Paar Monate keine Bock mehr auf das Spiel zu haben.
Un indémodable jeu de réflexion et de puzzle en 3D
Its portal. What else can you say?
Juegazo, buen diseño y obligatorio jugarlo
головоломка с захватывающем гимплеим с порталами

Portal 2 exceeds it in every way -- this feels Feels like a tech demo sorta thing in comparison. But it's a fun three hours and it gives context to Portal 2. Maybe buy it on sale, but I don't feel super ripped off having paid $10 for it
It's a relatively relaxed puzzle/platformer with great pacing.

very fun honestly, the game introduces mechanics to you at a steady pace that feels very natural. The puzzles were fun and varied, and never felt stale.
also using a portal high up on a wall and placing another portal below you as you fall to launch yourself really far is SO SATISFYING OH MY GOD
also the writing is 10/10

Portal круто очень хорошая головоломка где надо заставить свой мозг и эта концовка Глэдос говорила что я тебе сделала аш чуть чуть грустно стало ); игра крутая оч и эти усложненные камеры просто кошмар для мозка и еше респеут игре и разрабам за точто сделали Portal рекамендую
Very good but not as good as Portal 2
Good puzzle game, with great mechanics. 7/10
не советую и не много бесит

La mecánica de portal es bastante simple, pasas por un portal y sales por el otro. Lo que hace un gran juego a portal es el gran diseño de niveles creando situaciones donde implementas las nuevas mecánicas que aprendes a lo largo de los niveles los cuales tienen un gradual aumento de dificultad, que no los hace imposibles ni fáciles, creando un juego muy entretenido y desafiante a la vez.La jugabilidad es muy buena y no permite que te estreses ya que como mencione antes el mayor desafio de portal es resolver los puzzles usando la mecanica de los portales.  
[b] Si me preguntaran ¿ recomiendas Portal ? [/b]
-Por el precio y por la experiencia de juego única que ofrece lo recomendaría.
[table]
    [tr]
        [th]Portal[/th]
        [th]9.4/10[/th]

Buenos puzzles, te cagas de risa con GladOS, buena historia

10/10
God! I wish they would make portal 3!!!
Jogo curto e excelente. Terminei em mais ou menos duas horas e meia. pode jogar sem medo, principalmente se gosta de puzzle. Valeu cada centavo.

before you buy: This is a game.

Have you ever felt like you wanted to play a simple game with no complex backstory? Have you ever wanted to get some ez cake? Have you ever wanted to destroy your only friend in an [Insert spoiler here]. Here is the game

Amazing game, the mechanics were amazing and fun. The overall gameplay starts out easy, then gets more challenging as it goes along. It's always fun and easy to come back to.
I'd recommend the sequel as well.
